title: Hey Kirk Minihane Show Listeners!
description:
Alice Shattuck joins the show and wonders if Milton's has sizes that would fit her husband. Elon Musk takes over Twitter and starts making major changes (00:10:00). Gerry Callahan is appalled by Prince Harry's book deal (00:15:30). Bruce Springsteen will be on Howard Stern this Monday and we assume audio of Howard bashing him in 2005 won't be brought up (00:28:15). Kirk and Alice debate whether Trump will have the same impact against DeSantis (00:31:30). Kirk teases a big announcement with Erika Nardini next week (00:37:50). The full Shattuck family religious breakdown (00:59:00). Jeff D Lowe is giving Kirk show suggestions, calls & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
